name: Feel The Heat (Ferim Elwin)
description:
Get ready for a duel with the hottest molten gun slinger out there.

Use your sharp skills to swiftly dodge through a hailstorm of bullets. Fire back, and as your gun heats up, you'll be rapid firing. But watch the heat. If your gun gets too hot, you'll have to wait for it to cool down before you can continue you rain of bullets.
